CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( Start_Date__c ) , "" , (CASE(MONTH( Start_Date__c ), 1, "January ", 2, "February ", 3, "March ", 4, "April ", 5, "May ", 6, "June ", 7, "July ", 8, "August ", 9, "September ", 10, "October ", 11, "November ", 12, "December ", "None") & TEXT( DAY(Start_Date__c ) ) & ", " & TEXT( YEAR(Start_Date__c ) )))
CustomField.label: Formatted Start Date
